alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:52PM MDT until June 20 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY... At 351 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads to near Manderson to 4 miles west of Wounded Knee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Porcupine Butte Housing, Goose Neck Housing, Evergreen, Sharps Corner, Rockyford and Thunder Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
